Luiz Gustavo Ecco

  • Endereço para acessar este CV: http://lattes.cnpq.br/0992672445476737
  • Última atualização do currículo em 07/07/2019

Postdoctoral at the Federal University of Santa Catarina, Brazil In the course of his professional career, Luiz has been involved in research, development and field application in the following topics: 1. The use of organic coatings for corrosion control of metals - Functional waterborne and solventborne organic coatings - Powder coatings ? application/deposition method - Electrophoretic coatings ? application/deposition method 2. Preparation and nano sized compounds for corrosion protection of steel - Nanoceria with enhanced electrochemical activity - Electrically conductive polymers, i.e. Polyaniline, Polypyrrole. 3. Electrochemical techniques to assess organic coatings as well as inhibitors anticorrosive efficacy - Potentiodynamic polarization curves - Electrochemical Impedance Spectroscopy (EIS) 4. Accelerated laboratory and field corrosion tests alongside their standards to evaluate with comprehension the coatings and interface degradation of coated metals (Texto informado pelo autor)

Estudo visando otimização do rendimento das matérias-primas durante a etapa de carregamento dos fornos.

Linhas de pesquisa
1.
Development of green anticorrosion coatings for steel protection based on environmentally friendly nanoparticles and conductive polymers.


Projetos de pesquisa
2011 - 2014
EU - SteelCoat
Descrição: STEELCOAT is a project within the EU Seventh Research Frame Programme (FP7), in the area of NMP (Nanosciences, Nanotechnologies, Materials and new Production Technologies). The long term objective of this three-year project is to reduce the use of toxic and hazardous substances in, and extend the service life of, anticorrosion coatings for steel substrates. The consortium consisting of 10 partners from 6 different countries will develop new environmentally friendly, anticorrosion coatings with extended durability for steel protection. Both high solid solvent-borne and water-borne coatings will be developed and the corrosion protection in these novel coatings will be achieved by combining environmentally friendly nanoparticles and conductive polymer, together with novel compatible binder polymers..
Situação: Concluído; Natureza: Pesquisa.
Alunos envolvidos: Doutorado: (3) .

Integrantes: Luiz Gustavo Ecco - Integrante / FEDEL, M. - Integrante / Anwar Anhiwaz - Integrante / Jacob Becker - Integrante / Flavio Deflorian - Integrante / Jing Li - Integrante / Jinshan Pan - Integrante / Karin Persson - Integrante / Anders Larsson - Coordenador / Peter Colins - Integrante / Gregory Delmas - Integrante / Diego Penaloza - Integrante.

Número de produções C, T & A: 10


Projetos de desenvolvimento
2016 - Atual
Cataphoretic nanocomposite coatings based on nanoceria for corrosion protection of steel
Descrição: The overall objective of this research project is the production of waterborne coatings based on nanoceria via cathodic electrodeposition for corrosion protection of steel..
Situação: Em andamento; Natureza: Desenvolvimento.
Alunos envolvidos: Doutorado: (4) .

Integrantes: Luiz Gustavo Ecco - Coordenador / FEDEL, M. - Integrante / DEFLORIAN, F. - Integrante / ROSSI, S. - Integrante.
Financiador(es): Conselho Nacional de Desenvolvimento Científico e Tecnológico - Bolsa.
Número de produções C, T & A: 3
2015 - 2016
Development of Cerium oxide nanoparticles for enhanced anticorrosive protection of steel
Descrição: The project aimed the preparation of cerium oxide nanoparticles with enhanced potential as anticorrosive inhibitor on steel..
Situação: Concluído; Natureza: Desenvolvimento.
Alunos envolvidos: Doutorado: (4) .

Integrantes: Luiz Gustavo Ecco - Coordenador / FEDEL, M. - Integrante / DEFLORIAN, F. - Integrante / ROSSI, S. - Integrante / BECKER, JACOB - Integrante.
